Both strains displayed a MVIC of 10mM, while E. coli K12 was able to grow when exposed to the same methylamine concentration (Fig. 2). Then, we applied the methylamine inhibition assay to a panel of Bcc strains, representative of some of the species belonging to the complex, with the aim of determining their respective MVIC.
